data.title: [RELEASE] fromscratchtoml - The machine learning library you really understand. This library is my code base for storing code of popular machine learning algorithms from scratch while I understand them, keeping code-readability and simplicity over efficiency.
[WIP] sneakey - A commandline utility for pentesting.
[WIP] Packet-Analyzer This packet analyzer analyzes data sent over TCP, UDP and ICMP protocol and decipher various information about it.
[RELEASE] autopi - A Raspberry pi based iot home automation system.
[RELEASE] elon - Log your daily routines stay productive.
[RELEASE] mrmark - A personal customisable assistant integrated with Google assistant for controlling your machines remotely via voice commands, making it compatible with Google Home devices.
[RELEASE] Slimy - A pygame based game like Nokia's snake xenzia coded in python.
[RELEASE] Tanks -A pygame based game, just like Pocket Tanks
[RELEASE] MineCraft-2D The classical game of MineCraft. Now modded with ultra-low resolution.
[RELEASE] silVRsurfer - Connecting game engine with virtual reality using Arduino accelerometer input.
[UPDATE] Becca - Got opportunity to work with Dr. Brandon Rohrer on his idea of creating a general purpose learning agent using reinforcement learning.
